H0.text: What do students at Oxford call their formal academic attire . Formalia

H1.text: What do students at Oxford call their formal academic attire . Academia

H2.text: What do students at Oxford call their formal academic attire . Robes

H3.text: What do students at Oxford call their formal academic attire . SUBFUSC

A4.text: The University of Oxford has a long tradition of academic dress, which continues to the present day.

A5.text: Subfusc () comes from the Latin for 'of a dark/dusky colour', and refers to the clothes worn with full academic dress in Oxford.
